AUTORESPONDER::DESCRIPTION: Command to interact with Pingu's custom response module.
AUTORESPONDER::OPTION:CREATE: Creates a custom response. A custom identifier can be assigned.
AUTORESPONDER::OPTION:REMOVE: Delete a custom response using its identifier.
CCMD::DESCRIPTION: Command to interact with custom server commands.
ECONOMY::DESCRIPTION: Configure the economy module in your server.
JOINROLES::DESCRIPTION: Manage the roles given to users when they join the server.
JOINROLES::OPTION:LIST: List all the roles given to users when they join the server.
JOINROLES::OPTION:ADD: Add a role to the list of roles that are given to users when they join the server.
JOINROLES::OPTION:REMOVE: Remove a role from the list of roles that are given to users when they join the server.
LEVELS::OPTION:VIEWCONFIG: View the configuration the current configuration of the module
LEVELS::OPTION:DIFFICULTY: Modify the difficulty of the module for level advancement
LEVELS::OPTION:CUSTOMBACKGROUND: Set a custom background for your server's rank cards
LEVELS::OPTION:OVERLAYOPACITY: Set the opacity of the rank card overlay
LEVELS::OPTION:OVERLAYCOLOR: Set the color of the rank card overlay
LEVELS::OPTION:OVERLAYBLUR: Set the blur of the rank card overlay
P2DISMOD::OPTION:MODULE: The module to disable. Modules avaliable: welcomer, joinroles, farewell, moderation, levels, economy, autoresponder
P2ENMOD::OPTION:MODULE: The module to enable. Modules avaliable: welcomer, joinroles, farewell, moderation, levels, economy, autoresponder
SETLANGUAGE::DESCRIPTION: Change the language of the bot
